item.title: USB Communications Device Class
item.description: This code is not written by me. It is copy from website. I put it here just for easy to find. I change a little bit of this code to make it work. (It post 6 years ago, when i found it, it doesnâ€™t work.) /* * This is a simple example to communicate with a CDC-ACM USB device * using libusb. */ #include <unistd.h> #include <stdlib.h> #include <stdio.h> #include <errno.
